item.title: Parsing JSON using Qt 5 framework
item.description: Hello friends! In one of my previous posts, we had seen how to send a HTTP request using Qt. The response we got then was a JSON string. JSON is a subset of the object literal notation of JavaScript. It is basically a lightweight data-interchange format making it easy for humans to read and write. A JSON is build on two structures namely, A collection of name/value pairs. In various languages, this is realized as an object, record, struct, dictionary, hash table, keyed list or associative array.
